column5: Hit my fave pike spot with my bud this morning for about 5 hours, and man were they on! At first the day started slow with only 5 small ones caught in the first few hours, but then we moved to the other end of the bay and from 10am-12 noon we caught 15 pike, had just as many follows and many other attacks (misses) on our lures! Many were in the snot-rocket category, but a half dozen or more were in the mid 20" range, with the best 4 coming in at 26", 26", 29" and 29.5". Made for a fun day on the water! Lure of choice today : good old red & white Daredevle!
Great way to spend 5 hours!    Red & white is my favorite and has been good to me
What lake?  Great day for sure!
Looks like lots of 3's, 4's and 5's.  That last one might go a bit bigger.  Nice job.  What body of water?
Sounds like a great day to me, there's a reason that lures a classic.
Nice haul guys. Love those non stop action days!
Red/White spoon, it's gotta be the best pike lure out there. Sounds like you had a blast and great pics.  Good show.
Great job finding those pike Pete.  Nice report.  Corn Nug
Nice pike report!! Brings back memories of pike fishing as a youngster with my grandpa using red devils and five of diamonds spoons.
Awesome report...you gotta love it when it's non stop action!  I've only had that happen with panfish...LOL.  Great job out there!
Alright,!!!!!! dont you love it when you have a day like that  ,they are all a very nice as well....thanks for sharing....nice pics too...cheers
